meanings.definition: A person who studies or specializes in the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent1: The medievalists at the university have a deep knowledge of medieval history.
meanings.sent2: Many medievalists gather at conferences to discuss their research on the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent3: The medievalists joked that their love for castles made them modern-day knights.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, medievalists are like time travelers exploring the past.
meanings.sent5: The medievalists' passion for the Middle Ages is contagious among students.

meanings.definition: The group of scholars who focus on the history, culture, and literature of the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent1: Our library has a section dedicated to the works of medievalists.
meanings.sent2: The medievalists' society organizes events to promote understanding of the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent3: During the medievalists' meeting, they debated whether dragons could have existed.
meanings.sent4: The influence of medievalists on historical research is profound and far-reaching.
meanings.sent5: The medievalists' dedication to preserving medieval texts is commendable.
